vison_mission_desc: TCOMIE's strategic direction is to become a leading telecommunications and technologies company, acting as a pioneer in finding and paving the way for breakthrough technology solutions in digital transformation and artificial intelligence.
vison_mission1: Finding new customers and retaining customers/partners to help them achieve their goals and improve business profitability/efficiency
vison_mission3: To be committed to being responsible for the environment and society. This is also our mission statement, responsible for developing the prosperity of the community.
serviceDesc1:
• Providing optimization solutions for mobile networks 3G, 4G, and 5G.
  • Providing a database for tools that are used for designing, planning, and optimizing the mobile network.
  • Consulting, designing, surveying, installing, and base transceiver stations.
  • Providing a digital map database that is used for planning the mobile network.
  • Providing integrated software tools on the Web system.
  • Building of telecommunication infrastructure.
serviceTitle2: GPS, GIS, and remote sensing technologies
serviceDesc2:
• Consulting and developing overall solutions applying geographic information system (GIS) combining Remote Sensing and GPS technology
  • Provision of surveying, mapping, and remote sensing services and products.
  • Consulting, and building spatial decision support systems (SDSS)
  • Consultancy on integrating 4.0 technologies (AI, IoT, BigData, Blockchain, ...) with GIS, Remote sensing, and GPS in the Digital Transformation of agriculture and rural development (fisheries, aquaculture, cultivation, animal husbandry, irrigation...)
serviceDesc3: • Consulting, designing, surveying, and installing green energy such as solar power systems, and wind power systems.
